blogPost.excerpt: To get somewhere in life, business, study, relationships or anything else, it's important to get guidance from a mentor. But finding the right mentor is difficult. Mentspot provides a simple way to get connected with Mentors and Mentees in any category.
blogPost.body: To get somewhere in life, business, study, relationships or anything else, it's important to get guidance from a mentor. But finding the right mentor is difficult. Mentspot provides a simple way to get connected with Mentors and Mentees in any category.
blogPost.title: MentSpot - Find a mentor or become one for free
blogPost.author: Aleksandra Sztemberg

localize.description: 要想在生活、商业、学习、人际关系或任何其他方面有所成就，得到导师的指导是很重要的。但是很难找到合适的导师。MentSpot提供了一种与任何类别的导师和学员联系的简单方式。
localize.tagline: 寻找导师或免费成为导师

localize.description: 要想在生活、商業、學習、人際關係或任何其他方面有所成就，得到導師的指導是很重要的。但是很難找到合適的導師。MentSpot提供了一種與任何類別的導師和學員聯繫的簡單方式。
localize.tagline: 尋找導師或免費成爲導師

previous.excerpt: Fiddy is a weekly leaderboard of the best new Indie Hacker side projects. Like, comment on, or share the best projects you find, or submit your own to compete every week.

localize.tagline: 每周一次的最佳新辅助项目排行榜
